sub_title: Trainee in Business & IT | MBA | Imagineer | Experience Designer | Innovator
summary:
I am a graduate with a Master's degree in Business Innovation, I am currently undertaking a traineeship in Business & IT for Worldline. My mission is to leverage my knowledge and skills to drive growth and innovation in the industry and to make a positive impact in my organization.

With a passion for business and technology, I possess a diverse set of skills that enable me to excel in my current role. I am highly analytical, with the ability to identify opportunities for improvement and growth. I am also skilled in project management, with the ability to effectively plan, execute, and monitor projects from start to finish. Furthermore, my excellent communication and interpersonal skills allow me to collaborate effectively with cross-functional teams and stakeholders.

My motivation stems from a desire to make a positive impact and drive success in the industry. I am committed to constantly improving my skills and knowledge to stay ahead of the curve and make a significant contribution to my organization. With a goal of becoming a leader in the industry, I am confident in my ability to make a meaningful impact in any organization that values innovation and growth.

Overall, as a driven and highly skilled individual, I am committed to achieving success in my traineeship and contributing to the growth and success of my organization. I am excited to continue on this journey and look forward to the opportunities that lie ahead.

school.name: Panteion University of Social and Political Sciences

profile_positions.description:
I look after the needs of clients who seek solutions in the following 4 KEY AREA's - #ISSUING #ACCOUNTPAYMENTS #ACQUIRING #DIGITALSERVICES

Instant Payments, Payments Processing Back-Office, Trusted Transactions, Open Banking, Clearing & Settlement Services, Payment & Liquidity Hub

3. - Acquiring -
Acquiring Processing, Fraud Risk Management, ATM Management, Open Financial API Services, Software Licensing, Sensitive Data Protection

4.  - Digital Services - 
Identification and Authentication Services, End-User Banking Experience, Open Banking, Payment Services, Trade Order Management and Financial Data Services, Building best in class digital banking experience
profile_positions.title: New Business Development

profile_positions.description:
Concentrix is a technology-enabled global business services company specializing in customer engagement and improving business performance for some of the world’s best brands. Every day, from more than 40 countries and across six continents, the staff delivers next-generation customer experience and helps companies better connect with their customers. Creating better business outcomes and differentiate clients through technology, design, data, process, and people. Concentrix provides services to clients in ten industry verticals: automotive; banking and financial services; insurance; healthcare; technology; consumer electronics; media and communications; retail and e-commerce; travel and transportation; energy and the public sector.

As a customer service agent for Nike, I was responsible for providing excellent customer service and support. My daily responsibilities included:

•Responding to customer inquiries and providing support via various communication channels, such as phone, email, or chat.
•Troubleshooting customer issues, diagnosing problems, and finding effective solutions that met their needs.
•Processing customer orders and returns with accuracy and efficiency.
•Managing customer accounts, including updating customer information and resolving billing or payment issues.
•Escalating customer issues to higher-level support when necessary, to ensure the best possible resolution to customer issues.
•Providing customers with information about Nike products, including features, benefits, and availability.
•Staying up-to-date with the latest information about Nike products, services, and policies and incorporating that knowledge into my daily work.
•Providing feedback to the Nike team regarding customer experiences, trends, and suggestions for improving customer service.
•Collaborating with other customer service agents and team members to ensure a cohesive and effective approach to customer support.
profile_positions.title: Customer Service Agent for Nike

profile_positions.description:
Jaz in the city brings together locks and visitors in a unique new hotel concept. With a location right next/door to the city’s hotspots, a stay at the hotel is like visiting old friends - the kind of friends who are clued into what’s really going on. Music, art, culture, and good food just need the right stage - and Jaz in the City has exactly that. Spontaneous performances and new showcases happen every day, right where the local scene is going down. And staying at the Jaz means you’re always right at the heart of it.

•Support all aspects of F&B operations for a busy hotel, including restaurant, bar, banquets, and room service, and contribute to delivering exceptional guest experiences.
•Work collaboratively with a team of 30+ staff members, including chefs, servers, bartenders, and support staff, to ensure consistent quality and efficiency in all F&B operations.
•Adhere to policies and procedures to ensure compliance with health and safety regulations, and help identify opportunities for improvement.
•Assist in planning and executing menus and events for groups ranging from small business meetings to large weddings, and contribute to maintaining the highest standards of quality and presentation.
•Support purchasing activities by assisting in negotiations with vendors to ensure quality and competitive pricing, and help manage inventory and supply chain logistics to ensure timely delivery of goods.
•Monitor budgets and track expenses related to F&B operations and purchasing, and contribute to making data-driven decisions to optimize performance.
•Develop positive relationships with vendors, suppliers, and other stakeholders, and contribute to evaluating and improving the quality and value of the hotel's F&B offerings.
profile_positions.title: Purchaser - Food& Beverage
